metadata.title: CVE-2021-21209 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Inappropriate implementation in storage in Google Chrome prior to90.0.4430.72 allowed a remote attacker to leak cross-origin data via acrafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
